channel.title: Need help with no-ip
channel.description:
okay i made my edits in the source, and have both my client and source ready. i downloaded no-ip duc and registered a ip, bestscape.no-ip.org
now i start my server using the bat, and then run the client which is moparscape. then i make a new port cuz my port is 5555 then i put for the server my no-ip and it wont connect says server is down. yes i forwarded ports im sure i have 3ple checked everything, the only time it connects is when it uses 127.0.0.1, now i need serious help please!!!!

item.title: Need help with no-ip
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

ok when you portforwarded did you get your ip address from command prompt such as type ipconfig and then getting it.

Read full topic
